Pre-Game Insights: India will take on South Africa in a crunch Group 2 encounter at the Perth Stadium on Sunday.
An India win would more or less help India cement their position in the semifinal after wins over Pakistan and The Netherlands.
A defeat would extend their wait for a guaranteed spot in the semis.
South Africa would feel that they were unlucky to miss out on a point when their game against Zimbabwe ended without a result due to rain.
South Africa put on a dominating show against Bangladesh in their second fixture.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is scheduled for October 30, 2022, at 04:30 PM IST at Perth Stadium.
Virat Kohli has scored 144 runs from 2 innings and is yet to be dismissed in the competition.
Suryakumar Yadav and Rohit Sharma are key selections from India.
Rilee Rossouw and David Miller are key selections from South Africa.
Quinton de Kock is a preferred wicketkeeper choice over Dinesh Karthik.
All-round options include Hardik Pandya, Axar Patel, and R Ashwin from India, and Wayne Parnell and Aiden Markram from South Africa.
Bowling options include Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Arshdeep Singh, Anrich Nortje, and Kagiso Rabada.
